caption.p: Mass spectra and chemical structures identified in the fractions F6 and F10 from the M5L extract of L. hirta, Phytol ( a) and Î±-sitosterol ( b). In the fraction F10 from the M6LFr extract of A. ochroleuca, Toluene ( c). In the fractions F2, F4 and F5 from the M4LS extract of A. porophyllum, Hexanedioic acid, bis(2-ethylhexyl) ester ( d).
